extracted_content: This JSON-LD representation captures the structure of Article 10 from Directive 2006/6/EC, including its paragraphs, time specifications for compliance, monitoring times, and related concepts. The context provides namespaces for ELI (European Legislation Identifier), XSD (XML Schema Definition), SKOS (Simple Knowledge Organization System), DCT (Dublin Core Terms), and a hypothetical POLIANNA namespace for custom properties.
